warning.minimumRecommendedWarning: We need a minimum of 3500 words and ideally 6000 words or more to compute statistically significant results. See the science behind the service.
warning.selfReflectiveText: Ideally, the text should contain words we use in every day life relating to personal experiences, thoughts and responses. See usage guidence for details.

service.description: The IBM Watson Personality Insights service uses linguistic analytics to extract a spectrum of cognitive and social characteristics from the text data that a person generates through blogs, tweets, forum posts, and more.
